DOC.brief_title: Prospective Data Collection Elderly Patients With DLBCL Receiving Time Diagnosis VGM
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective data collection consecutive series elderly patient large B-cell lymphoma newly diagnose , receive start treatment Multidimensional Geriatric Assessment ( VGM ) use Activity Daily Living ( ADL ) , Instrumental Activity Daily Living ( IADL ) Cumulative Illness Rating Scale Geriatrics ( CIRS-G ) define 3 category : - elderly FIT ( ADL 6 ; IADL 8 ; 0 score= 3-4 , < 5 score=2 ) - elderly UNIFIT ( ADL 5 ; IADL 6-7 ; 0 score= 3-4 , 5-8 score=2 ; ≥ 80 fit ) - elderly FRAIL ( ADL ≤ 4 ; IADL ≤ 5 ; 1 score= 3-4 , > 8 score=2 ; ≥ 80 unfit )
